message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to detect stance and sentiment in tweets. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with the intersection of computer science and linguistics. The paper also uses techniques such as distant supervision and word embeddings, which are commonly used in sub-categories such as cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with classification tasks, which are commonly studied in sub-categories such as cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
